cast.original_title: Chicken Run: Dawn of the Nugget
cast.overview: A band of fearless chickens flock together to save poultry-kind from an unsettling new threat: a nearby farm that's cooking up something suspicious.
cast.title: Chicken Run: Dawn of the Nugget

cast.overview: In the mystical Scottish Highlands, Merida is the princess of a kingdom ruled by King Fergus and Queen Elinor. An unruly daughter and an accomplished archer, Merida one day defies a sacred custom of the land and inadvertently brings turmoil to the kingdom. In an attempt to set things right, Merida seeks out an eccentric old Wise Woman and is granted an ill-fated wish. Also figuring into Merida's quest — and serving as comic relief — are the kingdom's three lords: the enormous Lord MacGuffin, the surly Lord Macintosh, and the disagreeable Lord Dingwall.
cast.title: Brave

crew.overview: When a young girl stows away on the ship of a legendary sea monster hunter, they launch an epic journey into uncharted waters — and make history to boot.
crew.title: The Sea Beast

details.biography: Dean Williamson is an actor with broad experience in film, television, commercials, radio, theatre, and voice work which includes film and TV dubbing, corporate and commercials, as well as audio books and many videogames. His TV credits include Coronation Street, Holby City, Casualty, and Doctors. His experience ranges from Shakespeare and physical theatre to dancing in the last Muppet Movie, with a wealth of industry experience in rep and touring.
details.name: Dean Williamson
